name: Robert (DanielaGameiro)
description:
This is a game with a strong narrative strand, without action, just solving puzzles along the game, which are connected with the narrative. 

The main character was kidnapped by a sociopath fan and now, he needs to find a way out from where he is. 

He locks his idol (Robert) in a basement, where he will need to control a robot to escape the room. To escape Robert will need to go through puzzles to open up his own paintings to get the code for the final door.
